August 28, 1956
Dr* Harry Skornia
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr* Skornia:
I received today a letter from Mr* Kenneth Wright of the
Educational Television and Radio Center in Michigan. I had
asked him for suggestions concerning our new TV-Radio project
at Wofford and he in turn suggested I write you concerning your
seminar and workshop reports* Undoubtedly, you have received a
carbon copy of my letter to Mr* Wright*
I would appreciate any advice or suggestions you may have
to offer concerning the production of educational radio and
television programs* The questions I was primarily concerned
with are listed in Mr* Wright’s letter*
If there is anything you might add to this I would appreciate
your doing so*
Thank you in advance far your consideration*
Sincerely,
Assistant to the
Director of ftiblio Relations
